overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "Round Up" — Three cowboys force a fourth one with curly black hair and a mustache to get a blow job until he joins the fun and ends up fucking another guy who is rimming another one. "Rough Time" — It took Ted's young muscular partner over an hour of grueling pain and sweat before he could open up enough to accept full penetration by such a heavy hung stud. "Pleasure Point" —  After a day of surfing, Joe Markum heads back to the beach house and takes on the infamous Christy Twins.
title: Round Up
